title: US Lets Some Oil Companies Produce Oil, Gas in Venezuela
description: The Trump administration issued licenses allowing a handful of Western oil companies to operate in Venezuela, the latest step in a campaign to revive the country’s oil-dependent economy.
content: The Trump administration issued licenses allowing a handful of Western oil companies to operate in Venezuela, the latest step in a campaign to revive the country’s oil-dependent economy.
